name: Big Blob, Smøl Blob
description:
Try to stay big as long as you can ! You can shoot the birds with the mouse and absorb them to grow in size (because size matters, ya know) You shrink when you shoot and also when you get hit.

Big = Slow & More points

Smol = Fast but Less points

But beware, if you're too smoll you will explode !

Made with awesome programmer and musician TackyGuy ! https://tackyguy.itch.io/
